  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Coloring Book</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Farbton-Buch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Livre de Coloration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um Livro Da Coloração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Libro Di Coloring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα χρωματίζοντας βιβλίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Libro Del Colorante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis site presents printeable pages for coloring in, on a large variety of topics.The Coloring in activity is intended for pre-school children.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coloring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">preschool</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site stellt printeable Seiten für innen 
färben, auf einer großen Vielzahl des topics.The Farbtons in der 
Aktivität ist bestimmt für Vortraining Kinder dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site présente les pages printeable pour 
colorer dedans, sur une grande variété de coloration de topics.The 
dans l'activité est destiné pour des enfants de précours.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local apresenta páginas printeable para 
colorir dentro, em uma variedade grande da coloração de topics.The 
na atividade é pretendido para crianças do pré-escolar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo presenta le pagine printeable per la 
coloritura dentro, su una varietà grande di coloring di topics.The 
nell'attività è inteso per i bambini dell'addestramento preliminare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THis η περιοχή παρουσιάζει τις printeable 
σελίδες για το χρωματισμό μέσα, σε μια μεγάλη ποικιλία των 
θεμάτων Ο χρωματισμός στη δραστηριότητα προορίζεται για τα 
προσχολικά παιδιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio presenta las paginaciones printeable 
para colorear adentro, en una variedad grande de colorante de 
topics.The en actividad se piensa para los niños del 
pre-entrenamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vortraining</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coloration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">précours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coloração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pré-escolar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coloring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">addestramento preliminare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρωματισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσχολικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colorante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pre-entrenamiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
